Package FunctionLayer

Package contains plain java classes and theirs methods: Plain Old Java Object classes : Construction, Material, Order, Roof - abstract, RoofFlat, RoofPitched, Shed, Svg, Wall Other classes are used as a facade or to create and modify objects, they represent company logic

Package FunctionLayer Description

Package contains plain java classes and theirs methods: Plain Old Java Object classes : Construction, Material, Order, Roof - abstract, RoofFlat, RoofPitched, Shed, Svg, Wall Other classes are used as a facade or to create and modify objects, they represent company logic
